Job Posting:164022 - Position: S25 IT Systems Co-op 164022 E4 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/04/2025 11:50 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Acciona Infrastructuras Canada Inc Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description Job Title: IT Systems Co-op Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 IT Systems Co-op 164022 E4 Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Acciona is seeking a motivated and talented IT Co-op Student to join our dynamic team. As an IT Co-op Student, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various aspects of Information Technology while working closely with experienced professionals in the field. This position offers valuable exposure to real-world IT projects and technologies, allowing you to apply your skills and knowledge in a practical setting. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.acciona.com/our-purpose/work-with-us/job-detail/?id=20073990 Indicate your interest to apply to this position in SCOPE and also submit your application package via the online website portal. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may expire at any time. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
